content.raw:
Awesome. I prefer google style myself so I might even be able to put in the docstrings without any errors. 

As for my sphinx docs, I’ve since merged the branch down to master. I’ve also versioned a copy of the pdf output of the documentation. It is pretty ugly compared with the readthedocs style but it is complete and much smaller than the html output. It includes a section on how I set up my environment and how to generate the docs using the makefile.
content.html:
Awesome. I prefer google style myself so I might even be able to put in the docstrings without any errors.

As for my sphinx docs, I’ve since merged the branch down to master. I’ve also versioned a copy of the pdf output of the documentation. It is pretty ugly compared with the readthedocs style but it is complete and much smaller than the html output. It includes a section on how I set up my environment and how to generate the docs using the makefile.
